title: Game Club: A Short Hike
description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design.  This month's game is... the wonderful little cozy game, A Short Hike.  Come share your thoughts on the game with us!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/308786221
location: Qdoba (Creve Coeur) - 766 N New Ballas Rd - Creve Coeur, MO, us

title: Game Audio Club: Music Show & Tell!
description:
If you’re into making video game music or sound design (or just curious) come hang out with us once a month! Doesn’t matter if you’re a pro or just starting out— everyone’s welcome. Just bring your love for game audio. We’re a chill group where you can share your work, get feedback, or just vibe with people who love game audio. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/310012854
location: MAP St. Louis Montessori School - 3840 Washington Ave - St. Louis, MO, us

title: SciFest: Play and Creativity Expo
description:
SciFest: Connect with Science, Technology, Engineering and Math (STEM) professionals gathered exclusively for a series of day-long science and technology themed events.  Meet local scientists, engineers and other experts for a personal, close-up look at cutting-edge, creative STEM applications 
(View Full Event Description Here: https://www.slsc.org/event/scifest-play-and-creativity-expo/)

title: GameDev Social!
description:
Come chat with fellow creators about making, playing, and admiring games! Talk about your game ideas and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators. Our monthly hangout is open to EVERYONE. This is an all ages event, but minors must be accompanied by a parent or guardian. Alcoholic drinks are 100% optional. Dirty 20 has plenty of non-alcoholic drink options, yummy mac n' cheeses, and other munchies if you get hungry.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307236092
location: Dirty 20 Bar - 14051 Manchester Rd - Ballwin, MO, us
